NAME: lucifer
PRAMISE: Lucifer Morningstar has decided he's had enough of being the dutiful servant in Hell and decides to spend some time on Earth to better understand humanity. He settles in Los Angeles - the City of Angels.

NAME: the boss baby
PRAMISE: A suit-wearing, briefcase-carrying baby pairs up with his 7-year old brother to stop the dastardly plot of the CEO of Puppy Co.

NAME: selling sunset
PRAMISE: The elite real estate brokers at The Oppenheim Group sell the luxe life to affluent buyers in LA. The drama ramps up when a new agent joins the team.

NAME: locked up
PRAMISE: She broke the law for the boss she fell in love with. Now this naive girl has to pay the price.

NAME: fast & furious
PRAMISE: Lawman Luke Hobbs (Dwayne The Rock Johnson) and outcast Deckard Shaw (Jason Statham) form an unlikely alliance when a cyber-genetically enhanced villain threatens the future of humanity.

NAME: 6 underground
PRAMISE: Meet a new kind of action hero. Six untraceable agents, totally off the grid. They've buried their pasts so they can change the future.

NAME: titanik
PRAMISE: A seventeen-year-old aristocrat falls in love with a kind but poor artist aboard the luxurious, ill-fated R.M.S. Titanic.

NAME: midenight sun
PRAMISE: A 17-year-old girl suffers from a condition that prevents her from being out in the sunlight.

NAME: frozen
PRAMISE: Anna, Elsa, Kristoff, Olaf and Sven leave Arendelle to travel to an ancient, autumn-bound forest of an enchanted land. They set out to find the origin of Elsa's powers in order to save their kingdom.
